tasks.title: Initialize Next.js Project
tasks.description: Initialize a Next.js 15 project with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, ESLint, App Router, and src directory in the existing repo. Use npm (not pnpm). Command: npx create-next-app@latest . --typescript --tailwind --eslint --app --src-dir --import-alias "@/*" --no-turbopack. Must scaffold into current directory alongside existing ui-mockups/, docs/ folders without overwriting them.
tasks.details: Run from /Users/shaileshsingh/codename ScholarSync/. The directory is non-empty (has ui-mockups/, docs/, .git). create-next-app should handle this gracefully. Verify npm run dev works after.
tasks.testStrategy: npm run dev starts default Next.js page at localhost:3000. Existing mockup and doc files are intact.

tasks.title: Create Utility Functions and Font Configuration
